game.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 170 ‘Turbostar’ DMU Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Class 170 Turbostar is a great modern passenger train which is perfectly at home on any UK Train Simulator route.
